attributes.action: pass a law that prevents the manufacture and use of  non-recyclable, packaging and of any packaging that is recyclable but the process of manufacturing is environmentally harmful.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immediate action is needed so that earth can begin recovery from what we are doing; day by day we are causing more damage and upsetting the balance further. Consumers are clearly not making make the decision to change or in many cases, not able to change and the manufacturing continues - whilst it continues, there is money being made, and while money is being made, why stop? It is clearly up to the governments of the world to make a stance for the continuity of life on Earth and pass laws that make huge and immediate changes to save it.
